abstrac: Web Development, Mobile Development & Marketing Solution Provider
bio:
LetsNurture is ‘Nurturance.’ The word itself depicts growth

Our company holds an expertise in designing and developing innovative IT ideas. Having a team of practiced programmers and developers, we strive to offer cost-effective, timely and supreme quality services. No matter what the size of your business is, our motive is to offer you with a pool of services that are aimed at giving you better results. We offer IT outsourcing services for the domains mentioned below:

->Mobile Application Development (Android,iPhone,Beacon,Windows)
->Web application Development (PHP, Magneto,Yii,WordPress,Html5,Zencart)
->Advance mobile Solution

We have worked on Various Apps which includes Beacons, BLE, Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality Apps for our clients. We make sure we provide top notch quality work in time and we have a process working over Base Camp or Jira.

LetsNurture is an established 7+ years experienced Software development & IT consulting company, with development centers in India & UK. It has served clients around the globe and has played crucial part in their success.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

OUR APPROACH FOR YOUR PROJECT:

1. Application scope and requirement analysis
2. To design graphics for the same
3. After approval, we will create prototype
4. coding and features integration
5. QA & Testing
6. Make Web or application live in app store or Server.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Deliverable s from LetsNurture:

1. Source Code
2. IP Rights
3. Technical Documentation of Code
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Value Additions for no Extra cost:

1. Daily Work Report: Through Skype & Email
2. Weekly Work Progress
3. Meetings: Through Skype or Phone Call
4. Complete Project Documentation
5. Access to PMS tool
6. One Month technical support at no cost, as the case may be.

Terms will be set in agreement with the client.

Here are our normal payment arrangement.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
- For projects below $1,000: 50% advance, 50% on completion
- For projects between $1,000 and $5,000: 30% advance, 40% on mid project, 30% on completion
- For projects over $5000 we'll discuss with the client and decide together

abstrac: I'm a LAMP developer that specializes in WordPress development.
bio:
I'm a web developer from Ontario, Canada. I have been developing websites for over 5 years as a freelancer for clients around the world.

I specialize in WordPress development but I have worked with all sorts of content management systems including Joomla, Magento and many different custom systems.

I'm fluent in English and can work through Skype, email or on the phone and I'm equally as comfortable working through any of them.

I usually work from 12pm-12am Monday-Friday and alternating weekends. I can adjust my schedule for clients if it is required for bigger jobs.

I ask for a deposit of 50% of the project price before starting work and the other 50% before delivering the project. 

I develop websites on my own server so that you can see the work being done and it doesn't interfere with any live websites my clients might currently have.

abstrac: A full service DESIGN and ILLUSTRATION Studio located in New York
bio:
Polenghi Studio merges European and American sensibilities and aesthetics. The studio brings diversity and innovative thinking
to solve visual problems by fulfilling client needs for clear, meaningful and successful visual solutions for their business.

Polenghi Studio continues its dedication to fulfilling assignments for the children's market, creating content for books, games,
and educational programs with the objective of expanding the horizons of young minds. Evan's company WallsforKids, has been
one such vehicle for bringing colorful positive images to schools in the NYC area for over a decade. Please view the special projects
section for more information about WFK along with other projects.

We welcome comments and questions. We also are glad to provide more visuals from any section of our Studio's work. 
Please feel free to email or give a call.
